text:
Name: Ristorante Bella Vista
Address: 123 Via Roma, Florence, Italy
Opening Hours:
  - Weekdays (Monday–Friday):
      Lunch: 12:00 PM–3:00 PM
      Dinner: 6:00 PM–11:00 PM
  - Weekends (Saturday–Sunday):
      Lunch: 1:00 PM–4:00 PM
      Dinner: 5:00 PM–12:00 AM
Bruschetta al Pomodoro – Toasted bread with fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil. Price: €8
Insalata Caprese – Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, extra virgin olive oil. Price: €10
Minestrone – Hearty vegetable soup with beans, pasta, and seasonal vegetables. Price: €9
Panini Prosciutto e Formaggio – Grilled panini with prosciutto, provolone, arugula. Price: €12
Arancini – Risotto balls stuffed with ragù and peas, fried until golden. Price: €11
Gnocchi al Pesto – Potato gnocchi tossed in fresh basil pesto and pine nuts. Price: €13
Spaghetti alla Carbonara – Pasta with eggs, pecorino, guanciale, black pepper. Price: €14
Risotto ai Funghi Porcini – Creamy risotto with porcini mushrooms, white wine, Parmesan. Price: €18
Osso Buco – Braised veal shank with vegetables, served with saffron risotto. Price: €24
Saltimbocca alla Romana – Veal topped with prosciutto and sage, cooked in wine sauce. Price: €22
Tagliata di Manzo – Sliced grilled sirloin with arugula and shaved Parmesan. Price: €26
Linguine ai Frutti di Mare – Linguine with clams, mussels, shrimp in tomato-garlic sauce. Price: €20
Tiramisù – Espresso-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone cream. Price: €7
Panna Cotta – Creamy vanilla dessert with berry coulis. Price: €6
Gelato Trio – Three scoops of house-made gelato (chocolate, pistachio, lemon). Price: €8
Espresso – Single shot of Italian espresso. Price: €3
